ygData.subject: RE: EQ and Laptops
ygData.msgSnippet: It will probably have to be a decently new one, with a good graphics chip on it. EQ REQUIRES hardware acceleration, like something able to handle 3dfx, etc. I
ygData.messageBody:
It will probably have to be a decently new one, with a good graphics chip on
it. EQ REQUIRES hardware acceleration, like something able to handle 3dfx,
etc. I believe the Rage chipsets will work.

Good luck!

-----Original Message-----
From: MFerrulo@... [mailto:MFerrulo@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 12:05 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] EQ and Laptops


From: MFerrulo@...


I am going on the road for 2 weeks and may get a laptop so I can play while
travelling. Anyone ever see a EQ played on Laptop? Is it possible? Any
advice as to what kind of not to expensive laptop to get?

I do not expect the performance of my desk top - just something playable :)

Wizaro WrathCaster
Solusek Ro
